New Records: Nepal achieved their first win in the series with a 17-run victory over the United States.
Dipendra Singh Airee took 3 wickets for 27 runs in his debut match.
Key Match Events: Nepal's win was their first in the series after losing the previous three matches.
Dipendra Singh Airee contributed significantly with both bat and ball, scoring 30 runs and taking 3 wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: The USA won the toss and chose to bat first.
Nepal's bowling attack was key in restricting the USA to 147/7.
Post-Match Reflections: USA's top scorer was Andries Gous with 30 runs, but their batting couldn't capitalize on a good start.
Nepal's victory was a turning point in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas.
The series is part of the Nepal tour of the USA, 2024.
